doc.title: Fridays For Future – Our Social Media from all over the world
doc.excerpt: From India to Iceland, from a group in Zambia to individuals like Greta Thunberg – FFF social media updates

div.p: The newest & best posts of over 200 national FFF Social Media channels (currently only from Twitter; maybe soon: Instagram, Facebook & YouTube) with over 20 million followers in all FFF country channels – follow them too!
